alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Jones; Pamlico; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:23PM EDT until March 31 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JONES...CRAVEN...SOUTHEASTERN PITT...SOUTHWESTERN BEAUFORT AND SOUTHWESTERN PAMLICO COUNTIES... At 723 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ernul, or 14 miles north of New Bern, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Bern, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Blounts Creek, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Fort Barnwell, Jasper, Tuscarora, Rhems, Wilmar, Edward, Grantsboro, Royal, Bonnerton, Cox Crossroads, Riverdale and Olympia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
